docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - If Republican candidates for governor of California are hoping for an automatic high five from the sitting governor, they ought not to get too comfortable.

headline.main: Government vs. the Private Sector: Health Care and Student Loans

docs.abstract: At a recent congressional hearing, a representative asked whether it was proper for government to compete head-on with private enterprise. To formulate an answer, one may consider the current debate over the fate of the federal student loan program, an economist writes.
